Package game

Class BeingsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.BeingsManager
  • class BeingsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles addition/removal and movement of Beings in the game. We store beings in a set, but also store each one as reference in the Tile it is on. This allow us to only look at beings in nearby tiles when checking for collision.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addBeing

        protected void addBeing​(Being being)
        Add a being to the game world. Trigger Passable and/or Collidable if it is on some objects and/or colliding with some other beings.
        Parameters:
        being - The being to add.

      • removeBeing

        protected void removeBeing​(Being being)
        Remove a being from the game world.
        Parameters:
        being - The being to remove.

      • getCornerTiles

        private Tile[] getCornerTiles​(double x,
                              double y,
                              double beingRadius)
        A utility function to get an array of tiles a being might be on.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the being.
        y - The y position of the being.
        beingRadius - The radius (size / 2) of the being.
        Returns:
        An array of tiles at the top-left, top-right, bottom-left, and bottom-right corner of the being.

      • moveBeing

        protected boolean moveBeing​(Being being,
                            double dx,
                            double dy)
        Move a being. This function does the following:
        • Check that moving to the new position would not move any of the being's four corner into an not-Passable tile.
        • If some of the tiles are not pass-able, give up and return false.
        • Check for collision with beings around this one and call Collidable.collide(Being) accordingly.
        • If any collision is not pass-through (Collidable.getCanPassThrough()), give up and return false.
        • Call Passable.pass(Being) for tiles that the being will be on.
        • Set the being's new X and Y position.
        • Move the player reference to a new tile if needed.
        Parameters:
        being - The being to be moved.
        dx - Change in X axis.
        dy - Change in Y axis.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the move was successful.

      • updateBeingsAroundTile

        protected void updateBeingsAroundTile​(Tile tile)
        Trigger Passable and/or Collidable if for beings around a given tile. This is useful when the tile object changes (e.g. Floor changes to BombFlame).
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile around which to update beings.
